com.emxsys.chart.extension

Class XYPolygonAnnotation

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.emxsys.chart.extension.XYPolygonAnnotation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    XYAnnotation

    public class XYPolygonAnnotation
extends Object
implements XYAnnotation
    The XYPolygonAnnotation class draws polygon annotations on the foreground or background of an XYChart.
    Author:
    Bruce Schubert

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      XYPolygonAnnotation(double[] xyValues)
      Constructs a polygon annotation that uses CSS styles for stroke and colors.
      XYPolygonAnnotation(double[] xyValues, Double strokeWidth, javafx.scene.paint.Paint outlinePaint, javafx.scene.paint.Paint fillPaint)
      Constructs a polygon annotation with specific stroke and colors that override CSS styles.
